meanings.definition: A written or printed communication addressed to a person or organization.
meanings.sent1: He received a latters from his pen pal in another country.
meanings.sent2: The postman delivered a stack of latters to the office.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over a pile of latters waiting to be mailed.

meanings.definition: To send a letter or letters.
meanings.sent1: She latters her grandparents every week to stay in touch.
meanings.sent2: He latters his complaints to the company when he is unhappy with a product.
meanings.sent3: The magician latters invitations to his next show with disappearing ink.
meanings.sent4: The wind latters the leaves across the yard in a playful dance.
